website_summaries.verdict: Strong study guide for those preparing for the master's-level ASWB test. Great sample questions.
pros: Nice collection of study materials and practice exam questions
Hits on all major topics involved in social work, including info on concepts and procedures
cons: Doesn't provide enough detail for some people

customer_reviews.title: Excellent study material
customer_reviews.text: Very well organized with pertinent information.Right in the beginning it says to study with the official test outline that we already have. It doesn't indicate where that is exactly located although I will do a more thorough search. Otherwise, there is a great deal of organized info that has already given me more confidence that I can do well on this test even though I've been practicing for 35 years! I appreciate the care and thoughtfulness that went into putting this guide together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that the content is great and the test in the back fits well with the real test. The book also provides you with website links that will connect you to videos of actual people speaking about the content. This book is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rios

customer_reviews.title: LMSW Ready!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comprehensive guide that covers theories, values and ethics. It provides a practice test with not only answers, but explanations to help you better understand why something is correct or incorrect. I expect to pass my exam on the first try with this book. I also would like to add that I received this study guide way ahead of the predicted time-frame which really pleased me!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great aid, want online features like there are for your other products
customer_reviews.text: Although I just purchased this book I have found that it is extremely useful. I enjoy that the outline of the test is broken down into organized sections for easy studying. I also enjoy the answer key with explanations to the answers. I do wish there was something more online that had study aids even for a higher price. things like digital flash cards of the material in the book since it is easier to use an app to study on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great resource
customer_reviews.text: The table of contents was clear and concise. The material was easy to understand and explained in good details on ethics, models of practice, mental illness and other reliant topics to help prepare for the ASWB Master’s Exam. I like the practice test and rational behind the answers. This is a great tool on what to expect on the day I take the exam.
customer_reviews.author: icbluestars

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: this book was recommended by an old colleague and she was right! The study book is easy to understand, I appreciate the letter, the opportunity to write a success story, the access to the flash cards, and the study plan for those like me that are studying in advance! I LOVE IT! the bonus material is very helpful. This is my first study guide ever, so it is hard for me to criticize something that looks like is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Juan quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have book!
customer_reviews.text: Best book to use for studying which I have found. All the information you need is literally here. I highly recommend it to anyone. In fact, a few of my friends purchased it right after looking through my book. You will be totally prepared after using this for your exam prep. Good luck on your tests fellow Social Workers! <3
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I passed!
customer_reviews.text: This book helped me a ton with passing the ASWB exam! I took my test 6 months out of grad school and this was a great refresher! The practice test itself was worth the price! It offers explanations and gives you pg numbers to go back and study if you get it wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Foster

customer_reviews.title: This material is very helpful to me since I struggle ...
customer_reviews.text: This material is very helpful to me since I struggle with dyslexia, it allows me to study differently and gain the confidence that is needed to pass.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Passed on first try!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. I ordered the dawn book too. I used both because of having 2 practice tests but this is just more compact so I think I would have been fine with just this one! It’s straight and to the point and easy to understand and study. Passed on first try
customer_reviews.author: gracee

customer_reviews.title: Missing Section
customer_reviews.text: The book I received had nothing about human development or theories (section one). The first section has 5 pages and not one page covers anything about what it's supposed to but the test in the back has tons of questions relating to behavioral theories, human development, etc. Not worth the money and disappointing. Go with the Dawn Apagar book. Covers and delivers what it's supposed to and advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and easy study guide
customer_reviews.text: It is so helpful. I ordered this book for my undergraduate licensure as well and found it so helpful and easy to study. I passed that exam on my first try, so I’m hoping that by using this book to study again, I can pass once again. This book has great, relevant information and makes studying easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Licensure exam book
customer_reviews.text: I felt that this book had much of what I needed for studying for the exam, however it was kind of hard to follow in regards to which section covered what.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: It covers everything!
customer_reviews.text: I have just begun using it, and it clearly covers a large range of material I expect to be on the exam. I am very excited to continue learning and studying using this book. I enjoy how everything is categorized and sectioned to better understand the material. The 150 question practice test is also amazing and very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RESOURCE
customer_reviews.text: I have been reading the book and following the links for the videos which are so informative, this is the refresher that I needed to help me successfully pass my exam.
customer_reviews.author: Dannygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: One of most helpful things about this book is the tips on how to answer test questions. Studying the material can be straightforward but it is helpful to have tips on what to look for when reading the questions on the exam.
customer_reviews.author: jnj86

customer_reviews.title: Passed Master's Test on the first try.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to study for my Master's Test and passed with flying colors on the first try. I am ordering the free DVD as my husband is also going to be taking his Master's test in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: I needed a study guide that would help me be more organized with my studying. So far, this guide simplifies terms for me and has given me good study strategies. I also love the review videos that are embedded in the study guide since I learn more through audio and visual representation. I gave it four stars since I haven’t gone through the whole guide yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: I do want to say that this manual is very friendly, almost light reading, and summarizes everything up in a clear, and inviting way. I am very much satisfied with this purchase and feel it will be very helpful in my actual exam.
customer_reviews.author: Asaf Eyal

customer_reviews.title: Hoping this helps me only take the test once!
customer_reviews.text: I like how this is broken down. It relieves some of that test taking stress.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great info
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ASWB Masters Exam secrets. I rate this product a 5 because the content, ease of use, & the practice test at the end with rationale. This was a major tool used in passing my social work licensure exam.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I love this book!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book, especially how the categories are broken down and the information is in the book. It’s frustrating trying to find the key information through research. It made it easier to focus on the material and not the actual preparation.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: While this is not the only resource that I have relied on in my test preparation, this guide certainly helped to guide my study. The practice test was also helpful as were the justifications for the correct answers.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Best way to prepare for the ASWB...
customer_reviews.text: I have read on reviews that this is a great book in preparing for the ASWB Exam. In doing a quick review of it, the information provided is easy to comprehend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful so far!
customer_reviews.text: This study guide seems very helpful and will motivate me to study because I already realized how much I don’t know. Yikes. It’s easy to read and includes the material in the front, the practice test, and then the answer key with explanations about the correct answer.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: The book is great! I have been reading it every night just ...
customer_reviews.text: The book is great! I have been reading it every night just to get some info for my test. The steps to help with a multiple choice questiin is a good review for people who are anxious about test taking.
customer_reviews.author: guba15

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I like how structured and easy each section was to understand. There were some theorist that I was not familiar with, but this book was able to explain and introduce me to some new theorist. I really like that it has a practice test as well to test how prepared I will be for the examination.
customer_reviews.author: Glori Evans

customer_reviews.title: Outlines what you need to know!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book. It is a great outline for taking the lmsw. However, it was not as detailed with information as I thought. We will see what happens when I take the test!
customer_reviews.author: kbcross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent study material for the MSW licensing exam.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this book for anyone studying for their licensing exams. This book covers absolutely everything. It's a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Trent

customer_reviews.title: Preparation for MSW exam
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased "ASWB Masters Exam Secrets Study Guide; Your Key to Exam Success" to help me prepare for the Social Work Licensing Exam. I have been reading through the manual and find the information to be helpful (and overwhelming) in understanding the material to focus on. I appreciate the test taking secrets. I also appreciate the practice exam with explanations of the answers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found the guide to be a good concentrated breakdown of my 2 years of Graduate School
customer_reviews.text: I found the guide to be a good concentrated breakdown of my 2 years of Graduate School. I find it easy to understand each subject as they are broken down in clear delineations. It's brevity is it's strength there is so much to learn but the lack of fluff makes studying easier.
customer_reviews.author: John Lataille

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good study guide but would recommend taking the aswb practice tests instead. They are pricy but really work!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: **A Must Read for the Social Work Exam**
customer_reviews.text: This product was instrumental in helping me focus and prepare for my upcoming social work exam.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea McMath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. I answer the question, and then go back to study the corresponding information.
customer_reviews.author: M. Noel

customer_reviews.title: I love short summaries of all topics covered on the test
customer_reviews.text: I love short summaries of all topics covered on the test. It helps in refreshing my memory since I finished my master’s in Dec.2013.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria N.

customer_reviews.title: The organization of the book is odd. Points within ...
customer_reviews.text: The organization of the book is odd. Points within the book appeared to be copied and pasted together as it does not flow.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: I like how the four areas are divided up
customer_reviews.text: This study guide is portable and not overwhelming. All of the areas that I need to focus on are represented well in this guide. I like how the four areas are divided up, following a practice test. I friend of mine recommended this study guide, and stated "It is a great book to use to prep for the test."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Content material
customer_reviews.text: This book has supported my studying for the LMSW. After several attempts at the exam, this book provided the material to help support passing my upcoming exam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best resource to help me prepare and pass the exam.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and well written.
customer_reviews.text: This material was able to support me in staying on track and studying and the helpful secrets were also a bonus.

customer_reviews.title: amazing book and guide
customer_reviews.text: I like this book a lot. it is detailed and well described each and every part of the material. It is easy to get enough information. It is very helpful to study every part of syllabus. I am so grateful that I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great study source!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ASWB Masters Exam Secrets Study Guide and am very pleased with it so far. I received it in two days and look forward to utilizing it for my exam in the future. So far it is informative and is increasing my confidence for test taking.

customer_reviews.title: especially topics like DSM, values
customer_reviews.text: The book is quite helpful, especially topics like DSM, values, and ethics, answers and explanations.

customer_reviews.title: easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This book touches base with many topics, much more than I imagine! Helpful, easy to read!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I love the practice exam in the back
customer_reviews.text: The material was conscise. I love the practice exam in the back. The only thing is some answers to questions were not in the actual study guide and I had to research the answers apart from te study guide. Not sure if that was intentional and a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a comprehensive guide that covers main topics including ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a comprehensive guide that covers main topics including theory, values, ethics, drugs and alcohol and different approaches to social work etc. It provides a practice test with not only answers, but a description of why the answer was right or wrong. It has helped me get back in the game after being out for a number of years.
customer_reviews.author: Anazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Failed the exam however, with your book I feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Failed the exam however , with your book I feel very confident I’m going to pass.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Cris

customer_reviews.title: I used the book but I would recommend doing the online practice exam over this
customer_reviews.text: This was okay. I used the book but I would recommend doing the online practice exam over this. The test in the book felt alot harder than the ones in the actual exam. At times I felt myself reading over the answers to the questions and disagreeing with some of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize your study!
customer_reviews.text: Great resource that was recommended by a friend of a friend. Material is a easy read. This is the best study guide that I purchased. I feel confident I will pass the exam.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: it has all the information needed and I like the bullet format
customer_reviews.text: it has all the information needed and I like the bullet format...more organize then other study guides I have looked at
customer_reviews.author: Annie A.

customer_reviews.title: Its a useful guideline for preparing me to take the MSW exam
customer_reviews.text: I started studying a few days ago. I find the content helpful. There are some new content I did not cover in school. Its a useful guideline for preparing me to take the MSW exam. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevon Richards

customer_reviews.title: I honestly love this study guide
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this study guide! A lot of the problems I have with this test is the recall information and this study guides lays it all out for me. I have noticed that this is a great product for me to use in my studying, I greatly appreciate the product!

customer_reviews.title: Succinct Guide
customer_reviews.text: I just received the ASWB Masters Exam study guide and so far I really like how succinct the information is. It really gets to the meat of the information and I find the layout to be really easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: ... chapters are a little disorganized but this is an excellent study material for the exams
customer_reviews.text: Content headings and chapters are a little disorganized and a bit mixed up but this is an excellent study material for the exams. Its a guide but it gives enough information on the topics. Just wish that the information was more organized. The exams is more application and analysis and just a little knowledge, therefore one does not have to buy so many materials or very expensive stuff. This study guide along with materials from college years should be good enough. When I sit the exams I will return to inform of the results.
